Container.Name: Mindustry
Container.Overview:
This is a Basic Mindustry Server. It will download the preferred version of Mindustry and run it.
UPDATE NOTICE: If you set the GAME_V to 'latest' the container will always check on startup for a new version or you can set it to whatever version you preferr eg: '100', '90',... (without quotes, upgrading and downgrading also possible).
CONSOLE: To connect to the console open up the terminal for this docker and type in: 'docker exec -u terraria -ti NAMEOFYOURCONTAINER screen -xS Mindustry' (without quotes).

Config.Name: Game Version
Config.Description: Preferred game version goes here (set to ‘latest’ to download the latest and check on every startup if there is a newer version available)

Config.Name: Extra Game Parameters
Config.Description: Extra startup Parameters if needed (leave empty if not needed)

Config.Name: UMASK
Config.Description: Permissions for newly created files. Don’t change unless you are knowing what you are doing!
